mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.ddh AS "ddh", a.xdrq AS "xdrq", a.yysj AS "yysj", a.ddlxdm AS "ddlxdm", a.zj AS "zj", a.fksj AS "fksj", a.khxm AS "khxm", a.yddh AS "yddh", a.sqtksj AS "sqtksj", a.tkly AS "tkly", a.tkshjg AS "tkshjg", a.yhpj AS "yhpj", a.pjxq AS "pjxq", a.ddztdm AS "ddztdm", a.qydm AS "qydm.code", a.pszj AS "pszj", a.note AS "note", a.psdj AS "psdj", a.psyj AS "psyj"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, ddh, xdrq, yysj, ddlxdm, zj, fksj, khxm, yddh, sqtksj, tkly, tkshjg, yhpj, pjxq, ddztdm, qydm, pszj, note, psdj, psyj ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{ddh}, #{xdrq}, #{yysj}, #{ddlxdm}, #{zj}, #{fksj}, #{khxm}, #{yddh}, #{sqtksj}, #{tkly}, #{tkshjg}, #{yhpj}, #{pjxq}, #{ddztdm}, #{qydm.code}, #{pszj}, #{note}, #{psdj}, #{psyj} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_order SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, ddh = #{ddh}, xdrq = #{xdrq}, yysj = #{yysj}, ddlxdm = #{ddlxdm}, zj = #{zj}, fksj = #{fksj}, khxm = #{khxm}, yddh = #{yddh}, sqtksj = #{sqtksj}, tkly = #{tkly}, tkshjg = #{tkshjg}, yhpj = #{yhpj}, pjxq = #{pjxq}, ddztdm = #{ddztdm}, qydm = #{qydm.code}, pszj = #{pszj}, note = #{note}, psdj = #{psdj}, psyj = #{psyj} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order WHERE psdj = ${data}
